abstract: Updated: General Growth Properties confirmed late on Monday that it had received a proposal from its largest shareholder and its largest unsecured creditor in which they will invest about $3.93 billion in the bankrupt mall operator as part of the company’s plan to emerge from bankruptcy in partnership with Brookfield Asset Management.
